org.apache.taverna.server.master.utils

Class JCECheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.utils.JCECheck

  • public class JCECheck
extends Object
    Trivial bean that checks for whether the JCE policy files that allow unlimited strength security are present, and warns in the log if not.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JCECheck()

      Write a message to the log that says whether an unlimited strength cipher is present.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JCECheck

        public JCECheck()

    • Method Detail

      • checkForUnlimitedJCE

        @PostConstruct
public void checkForUnlimitedJCE()
        Write a message to the log that says whether an unlimited strength cipher is present. This is the official proxy for whether the unlimited strength JCE policy files have been installed; if absent, the message is logged as a warning, otherwise it is just informational.

      • isUnlimitedStrength

        public boolean isUnlimitedStrength()
        Returns:
        Whether the unlimited strength JCE policy files are present (or rather whether an unlimited strength cipher is permitted).
